channel.title: Endless-Online
channel.description:
[url=http://www.endless-online.com/]www.Endless-Online.com[/url]
[url=http://www.endless-online.com/gallery-new.html]Endless-Online Screenshots[/url]
This game is pretty fun. I think we may be able to cheat on it too. It's pretty much a game like runescape, only no skills just people fighting. It gets kind of boring sometimes, but you can sell the gold on ebay for a lot of money, and to my knowledge not too many bots are on this game. None that I have found.
You press ctrl to fight, and you can only kill if you're facing the monster you're trying to kill.
So if we had some kind of autoer that saw a certain color, used the arrow keys to get closed to the color, and when that color was only an inch away from your character (which is in the middle always), you would turn to face it (using bitmaps to face it properly) and start press ctrl. You could run something liek that over night and collect lots of gold and items.
Also if you way too much, over 70 I think, you won't be able to attack. So something that would check the weight too. Or... if you weighed too much, the bot would instantly go to the shop and sell all the items, and come right back and start fighting again. This game is about 2 years old, and hopefully later on in the game, they will add things like quests. There are so many areas to explore. The only downside is that it takes forever to lvl, but if you had a bot, you would be lvl 10 or something over night. Lvl 10 is hard to get, I'm only lvl 2 lol.
Just an idea. Fun game though. Kind of like MapleStory only it's 3D and it's a very small game, only 12 MB or something. Perfect for dial up users ;).
~Ron

item.title: Endless-Online
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Well a mirror is just another website that is hosting the file. Mirrors are only useful when a lot of people are trying to download the program from that mirror, so that way, you have another website to choose from, or another mirror.

So just download the Auto-Setup. That’s the .exe file that will install all the folders/files/registry entries, etc.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Blapmanjr Blapmanjr
item.description:
@Blapmanjr wrote:

   How to get started

To enter the interactive worlds of Endless Online you need to download the latest client [v25 alpha] and install it on your computer.

     HTTP Mirror (endless-online.com)

Click here to download Endless 0.25 [12.40 MB] as auto-setup.
Click here to download Endless 0.25 [15.35 MB] as manual zip file.

     HTTP Mirror (ogrens.net)

Click here to download Endless 0.25 [12.40 MB] as auto-setup.
Click here to download Endless 0.25 [15.35 MB] as manual zip file.

item.title: Endless-Online
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

I’ve had this game for ages, and I mean ages. It’s not like it used to be, before you could train without waiting 5000 minutes for 1 monster. Went back on and it took me 8 hours to get 2 levels from goats.

SCAR can auto the game, but the scripts need to be good. What I did was jam a spoon in the ctrl key so it kept attacking then make a simple script so if it see’s gold it clicks the mouse(as I don’t move, it works).

Read full topic

item.title: Endless-Online
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

I made a small script in scar, and it makes mycharacter spin around in circles. So Scar does work.

I don’t want to ‘hack’ the game, I just want my mouse to move and do the work for me. That’s cheating, not hacking.

~Ron

Read full topic

item.title: Endless-Online
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

This game apparently has WPE detection - it won’t access the net until it’s closed or, presumably, cloaked.
Also, it seems like the dev has it using independent timers (?) to combat speedhacking.
They ‘just don’t work’ on the Endless program.

The protocol is not immediately obvious; though I think there is a consistent header structure.
Too many people around to analyse action->packet with a live capture, your stuff gets shoved out of the queue by diaper-wearing people walking around killing goats. wtf?

Read full topic
